'''''From Soil You Are, and to the Sand You Shall Return...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Temple Where Sand Flows Like Tears]]''.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement may refer to the Bible verse {{w|Book of Genesis|Genesis}} 3:19, originally referring to dust instead of soil and sand.
